user.title: First time setup
user.description:
## Welcome to Huotian Dayou integration!

This integration is designed to aggregate and manage your AI conversation entities to provide a more flexible interactive experience. The open source code is provided by KNOOP, and you are welcome to submit PR and usage suggestions.

### User Guide
- Supports all Home Assistant certified conversation entities
- Up to three different conversation proxy entities can be added
- Support multi-level dialogue proxy fallback mechanism
- Support in-depth thinking intelligent summary

### Notes
- We don't produce AI, we are just porters of AI
- No additional memory burden on the system
- No other networking methods will be added

Please set your integration name and click Submit to proceed to the next configuration

init.title: Configuration Center
init.description:
Please select the part to configure:

- **Dialogue Agent Settings**: Configure the primary and alternate dialogue agents
- **Dialogue Mode Settings**: Configure the dialog display method and error response
- **Voice Output Settings**: Configure voice output devices and services

Select an option to continue configuration

agent_settings.title: Dialogue Agent Settings
agent_settings.description:
Set up a three-level dialogue agent:

- **Primary AI Entity**: The dialogue agent that is mainly used (it is recommended to choose Home Assistant built-in dialogue entity)
- **Backup AI Entity**: Alternate dialogue agent used when the preferred AI cannot respond
- **Level 2 backup AI entity**: The dialogue agent used when neither level 2 dialogue agent can respond. If deep thinking is enabled, it will be processed by the last AI

If a certain level of dialogue agent is not required, you can click (X) after the option to cancel the selection

conversation_settings.title: Dialogue Mode Settings
conversation_settings.description:
Configure how AI reply is displayed and error response templates:

- **Dialogue Mode**: Select the display format of AI reply
- **Error filtering field**: Set the error prompt template when AI cannot respond
- **Finally AI Intelligent Summary**: After enabled, the output of the previous AI is handed over to the last AI to process, and the output is uniformly summarized and outputted by the last AI. The final AI entity configuration is recommended. The Ollama local model processing experience is better

Error filtering fields support Jinja2 template syntax, etc.

data.enable_ai_summary: Deep Thinking - DeepSeek Edition Intelligent Summary

speaker_settings.title: Voice output settings
speaker_settings.description:
The type of voice output device you want to use:

- **Close voice output**: Use text conversation only
- **Xiaomi speaker**: Use Xiaomi speaker as voice output device
- **Other speakers**: Use other supported media players and TTS services

After selecting, click Next to configure it in detail

xiaomi_speaker.title: Xiaomi speaker settings
xiaomi_speaker.description:
Select the Xiaomi speaker device to use for voice output. The system will automatically detect Xiaomi speaker equipment in your environment.

If no available Xiaomi speakers are detected, make sure your device is properly connected to Home Assistant.

data.info: No available Xiaomi speakers were detected

other_speaker.title: Other speaker settings
other_speaker.description:
Select the device and TTS service to use for voice output:

- **Speaker Device**: Select the supported media player entity
- **TTS Service**: Select a service for text to voice

If no available devices or services are detected, make sure you have installed and configured the relevant integration
